projectsData.name: My Portfolio
projectsData.description: My portfolio demonstrates my expertise in web development through a collection of projects. It highlights my skills in technologies such as HTML, SCSS, JavaScript (JS), React and Ant-design showcasing a variety of responsive and dynamic web applications.

projectsData.name: Modern Human Resource Information System (HRIS) using React
projectsData.description: This is a responsive and high-performance web application built using React.js for the front end, Node.js for the back end, and SQL for database management. The UI is designed with Ant Design and SCSS, ensuring a modern and user-friendly experience.

projectsData.name: ACCAS Contract Management, Monitoring and Reporting System
projectsData.description: The ACCAS system was proudly developed by the ABLE Team. It is a responsive and high-performance web application designed to streamline the entire lifecycle of contract creation, management, monitoring, and reporting. The system uses React for a dynamic front end and Laravel for a robust back end, with MySQL ensuring reliable and secure data storage. The user interface is built with Shadcn UI, providing a clean, modern, and intuitive experience â€” making it easy to use for both technical and non-technical users alike.

careerData.name: Software Engineer
careerData.description: Designed, developed, and maintained web applications, ensuring efficient, reusable, and reliable code. Collaborated with cross-functional teams in various aspects of development, including front-end, back-end, and database design.

careerData.name: Junior Programmer
careerData.description: Managed multiple software projects, ensuring on-time delivery and high-quality output while mentoring team members. Also developed and maintained an inventory management system.

careerData.name: Junior Programmer
careerData.description: Collaborated with a capable team to build user-friendly systems, successfully turning project ideas into functional applications.
